729856f-a.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Minthorne Street
729856f-a.text:
Victory Boulevard, south side, between Minthorne
Street and the Upper Bay, showing under construction, a public
swimming pool. One of the Toaapkinsville piers is visible across
the pool.
December 11, 1935
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729856f-a.folder: Victory Boulevard & Minthorne Street, Staten Island, NY

729857f-a.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Minthorne Street
729857f-a.text:
Victory Boulevard, south side, between Minthorne
Street and the Upper Bay, showing the George Cromwell Center
swimming pool. Also shown are the Tompkinsville piers.
August 28, 1937
Views 1, 2, 3
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729857f-a.folder: Victory Boulevard & Minthorne Street, Staten Island, NY

729854f-a.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Minthorne Street
729854f-a.text:
(1)
Victory Boulevard, south side, at Minthorne
Street, showing the Tompkinsville Station of the
Staten Island Rai iroad. The view is in a south-
easterly direction across the Boulevard.
June 13, 1931
LL. Sperr
NO RERRODUCTIONS
(2)
Another view of the station, looking north along
the tracks. Across the station a.3pear warehouses of the
American Dock Company and in the left center back-
ground is visible, in silhouette, the Richond Borough
all, in St. George.
January 13, 1931
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
The new Tompkinsville Railroad Station. A
public swimming pool has been erected on the east
side of the railroad tracks.
October 4, 1936
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729854f-a.folder: Victory Boulevard & Minthorne Street, Staten Island, NY

729855f-b.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Minthorne Street
729855f-b.text:
Victory Boulevard, south side, between Minthorne
Street and the Upper Bay, showing the site where a new public
swimming pool was erected later in the year. The view is south-
eastward across the site toward the Tompkinsville piers.
June 15, 1935
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
The same, six months later, showing the pool under
oonstruction. Note also the old Tompkinsville Station of the
Staten Island Rapid Tranait Railway.
December 11, 1935
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
The pooliafter completion. Shown,too,is a newly
erected ramp across the rsilroad tracks.
June 12, 1937
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
